sentences.sentence: Virgin Galactic had, prior to this week's accident, seemed closest to starting regular flights.
sentences.translation: 在本周事故发生前，维珍银河公司似乎离开始定期飞行仅有咫尺之遥。

sentences.sentence: On the flip side, companies like Virgin Galactic are plotting a bottom-up assault on the space dream by making it a reality to the public.
sentences.translation: 另一方面，维珍银河等公司正在策划对太空梦发动一场自下而上的袭击，让普通大众也能够实现自己的太空邀游梦想。

sentences.sentence: In an interview last year with The Economist, George Whitesides, chief executive of space-tourism firm Virgin Galactic, was placing his company in the latter category.
sentences.translation: 在去年接受《经济学人》采访时，太空旅游公司维珍银河的首席执行官乔治·怀特赛兹将他的公司归为后一类。
